text: Duâ€™ti samudra samana haya na-ekati mitha o trsnanibaraka ebam aparati lona. Ubhayati theke'i tomara taja gosata (matsa) ahara kara ebam paridhane byabaharya gayanagati aharana kara. Tumi tate tara buka cire jahaja calate dekha, yate tomara tara anugraha anbesana kara ebam yate tomara krtajnata prakasa kara.
